Text: The limits applicable to individual issues and issuers have not been changed. A monthly volume of EUR 20 billion, however, gives the ECB the opportunity to resume net purchases for at least twelve months, even with the current limits.
Cause: The limits applicable to individual issues and issuers have not been changed.
Effect: A monthly volume of EUR 20 billion, however, gives the ECB the opportunity to resume net purchases for at least twelve months, even with the current limits.
Sentence: <e1>The limits applicable to individual issues and issuers have not been changed.</e1> <e2>A monthly volume of EUR 20 billion, however, gives the ECB the opportunity to resume net purchases for at least twelve months, even with the current limits.</e2>
